version_description:
25/06/2013 New version of the App (Version 1.1)
We’ve corrected the following bugs (thanks for reporting them!)
- Improved general application stability.
- Improved advertising and statistics tagging.
We’ve added the following feature
- iPhone 5 and iPad mini compatibility.

What's new in this version: 
• Easy slide navigation through sections and stories
• Optimized iPad experience (enhanced videoplayer and full screen for VOD)
• General optimization and performance enhancements

Fixed!
We have corrected the following issues :
• App stuck on the loading page
• Percentage miscalculation in the voting of “Good/Bad news”
• Quiz: truncated questions (iPhone 4)
• Need to reboot the device to refresh the iOS8 widget (iPhone 6)

As always, thanks for your useful feedback and your help improving our app!

• Find breaking news inside the app
• New section dedicated to Sports
• Offers Apple Watch app for iPhone : never miss breaking news and find handpicked, watch-exclusive content!

Fixed!
We have improved general stability and corrected the following issue :
• Share an article on Facebook was incomplete

We thank our dear users for their help improving the euronews app.

Minor debugs
As always, thanks for your useful feedback and your help improving our app!

Discover Euronews' new brand identity! Euronews has revamped its logo, graphics, and on-air look.

Euronews, with its strong tradition of independent journalism, is launching its new spirit, "All Views", a groundbreaking reporting strategy and a major step forward in the evolution of the news broadcasting environment.

This version includes ENRICHED CONTENT!
• Euronews' "JUST IN" timeline: never miss breaking news, follow live news and scroll up to go back in time infinitely!
• Infinite scroll also on our thematic verticals: NEWS (now including SPORTS & BUSINESS), LIFESTYLE (CULTURAL EVENTS), EUROPEAN AFFAIRS, KNOWLEDGE (SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY)
• Unlimited access to all your favorite PROGRAMMES. Watch and rewatch any episode on demand from the PROGRAMMES section (left menu): CINEMA, LE MAG revamped as CULT, HI-TECH, BRUSSELS BUREAU, SCIENCE, REPORTER, FUTURIS, THE GLOBAL CONVERSATION, MUSICA…
• Autoplay of the videos now 'disabled' by default. Choose when to activate autoplay according to your connection (option manageable through the settings).

We have corrected the following issues:
• Widget: empty feed for the Top Stories
• Apple Watch: push notification for Picture of the Day was dysfunctional

• Minor debugs
• Pull down to refresh the "JUST IN" timeline wasn't effective

Write to us at appsupport@euronews.com and tell us your feelings about the latest improvements: 
• Euronews' "JUST IN" timeline: never miss breaking news, follow live news and scroll up to go back in time infinitely!
• Infinite scroll also on our thematic verticals: NEWS (now including SPORTS & BUSINESS), LIFESTYLE (CULTURAL EVENTS), EUROPEAN AFFAIRS, KNOWLEDGE (SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY)
• PROGRAMMES section: watch and rewatch the latest episodes on demand in the PROGRAMMES section (left menu)
• Autoplay of the videos now 'disabled' by default. Choose when to activate autoplay according to your connection (option manageable through the settings).

As always, thanks for your useful feedback and your help improving our app!

• Minor debugs

Write to us at appsupport@euronews.com and tell us your feelings about the latest improvements: 
• Euronews' "JUST IN" timeline: never miss breaking news, follow live news and scroll up to go back in time infinitely!
• Infinite scroll also on our thematic verticals: NEWS (now including SPORTS & BUSINESS), LIFESTYLE (CULTURAL EVENTS), EUROPEAN AFFAIRS, KNOWLEDGE (SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY)
• PROGRAMMES section: watch and rewatch the latest episodes on demand in the PROGRAMMES section (left menu)
• Autoplay of the videos now 'disabled' by default. Choose when to activate autoplay according to your connection (option manageable through the settings).

As always, thanks for your useful feedback and your help improving our app!

- Find a direct link to our website in case of a live event coverage (article pages)
- Navigation optimization

We fixed the following issue :
- Refresh of the app caused crash

As always, thanks for your useful feedback and your help improving our app!

Discover Euronews app's total makeover!

WHAT'S NEW
• Brand new design
• Enriched experience
• New features

RICH CONTENT
• Rich media content (pictures, tweets, YouTube videos...)
• Live blogging now available
• Compatibility with 360° videos

Coming soon: new features and enhancements in the next releases. The Apple Watch app will be back with better features.

ENRICHED APP
Thanks for your support and useful comments!
• LIVE stream is now in full HD
• Watch fully functional PLAYLISTS of videos
• PUSH notifications are now linked to articles
• Discover our 3D TOUCH shortcuts for a different access to our content
• Be kind to your data plan and use the DATA SAVINGS feature 
• Watch LIVE in thumbnail as you browse through the app
• Choose your way of playing videos (autoplay or not)

IMPROVEMENTS IN THE APP
The following issues were fixed, we thank our dear users for reporting them!
• If you can’t hear sound from your speakers
• Performance enhancements - faster loading of the pages
• Widget is now automatically translated in your language
• Push notifications: bug fix related to language
• Rotating your iPhone automatically plays the video in full screen
• Other minor bug fixes

No sound on the videos? Please check your device's sound settings.

AND ALWAYS AVAILABLE:
• Brand new design
• Faster-than-ever navigation
• Rich media content (Pictures, Tweets, YouTube videos...)
• Live blogging now available
• Compatibility with 360° videos

COMING SOON: new features and enhancements in the next releases. The Apple Watch app will be back with better features.

Bug fixes and performance improvements.
 
ENRICHED APP
Thanks for your support and useful comments!
• LIVE stream is now in full HD
• Watch fully functional PLAYLISTS of videos
• PUSH notifications now open linked articles
• Discover our 3D TOUCH shortcuts for a different access to our content
• Be kind to your data plan and use the DATA SAVINGS feature 
• Watch LIVE in thumbnail as you browse through the app
• Choose your way of playing videos (autoplay or not)

IMPROVEMENTS IN THE APP
The following issues were fixed, all thanks to you dear users for reporting them!
• Now you can hear sound from your phone speakers
• Performance enhancements – Now pages load faster 
• Widget is now automatically translated in your language
• Push notifications: bug fix related to language
• Rotating your iPhone automatically plays the video in full screen
• Other minor bug fixes

No sound on the videos? Please check your device's sound settings.
 
AND ALWAYS AVAILABLE:
• Brand new design
• Faster-than-ever navigation
• Rich media content (Pictures, Tweets, YouTube videos...)
• Live blogging now available
• Compatibility with 360° videos
 
COMING SOON: new features and enhancements in the next releases. The Apple Watch app will be back with better features. Stay tuned!

ENRICHED APP:
Thanks for your support and useful comments!
• OFFLINE MODE to read articles without any connection
• New 3D TOUCH shortcut: I'm feeling curious
• The EXPLORE tab has been revamped for a more in-depth discovery of our content
• READ IT LATER: your selection of articles you wish to save for later
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

AND STILL AVAILABLE:
• Up-to-date world news 24/7 in VIDEO
• HOME: our editor’s choice for global news
• Constantly updated TIMELINE of all the news, wires, reports and magazines
• PROGRAMMES in VoD
• Euronews TV in live streaming*
• 12-language editions

SPECIAL FEATURES
• Receive PUSH NOTIFICATIONS for BREAKING NEWS
• Watch fully functional playlists of videos
• OFFLINE MODE to read articles without any connection
• READ IT LATER: your selection of articles you wish to save for later
• Widget displaying BREAKING NEWS and TOP STORIES
• Discover our 3D TOUCH shortcuts for a different access to our content
• Be kind to your data plan and use the DATA SAVINGS feature 
• Share articles via social networks
• Text size

Lost? Read our TUTORIAL to read all about the features of the brand new Euronews app.

COMING SOON: new features and enhancements in the next releases. The Apple Watch app will be back with better features. Stay tuned!

* Unavailable in the USA and in Canada due to distribution restrictions. Available only in English for Arabic, Persian, Ukrainian editions.

FIXED! >> Crash on iPhone X when opening articles

ENRICHED APP:
Thanks for your support and useful comments!
• Top Stories - new look to better highlight important topics
• 'Peek & Pop' feature on article lists (force touch)
• iOS 11 compatibility
• Use the search on your iPhone to find Euronews articles (Spotlight)
• App performance improvements
 
WE FIXED THE FOLLOWING BUGS:
• Crash on iPhone X when opening articles
• Article pages sometimes fail to load correctly (small font, zoomed in font, grey areas on content, no scroll control)
• 'Tap on' notification doesn't open the article (if app stays in background for a long time)
• Email feedback (SERVICES > About this app > Contact Us): no pop-up when message is sent
• Video loads indefinitely when connection is temporarily lost
 
AND STILL AVAILABLE:
• Up-to-date world news 24/7 in VIDEO
• HOME: Our editor’s choice for global news
• JUST IN: Constantly updated TIMELINE of all the news, wires, reports and magazines
• PROGRAMMES in VoD (VIDEOS or EXPLORE tabs)
• Euronews TV in live streaming*
• 12 language editions
 
SPECIAL FEATURES
• Receive PUSH NOTIFICATIONS for BREAKING NEWS
• Watch PLAYLIST of videos
• OFFLINE MODE To read articles without any connection
• READ IT LATER: Your selection of articles you wish to save for later
• Widget displaying BREAKING NEWS and TOP STORIES
• Discover our 3D TOUCH shortcuts for a different way to access our content
• Be kind to your data plan and use the DATA SAVINGS feature
• Share articles via social networks
• Change the text size
 
Lost? Read our TUTORIAL to read all about the features of the brand new Euronews app.
 
COMING SOON: New features and enhancements in the next releases. The Apple Watch app will be back with better features. Stay tuned!
 
* Unavailable in the USA and in Canada due to distribution restrictions. Available only in English for Arabic, Persian and Ukrainian editions.

Thanks for your support and useful comments!
• Tab bar: better visibility of the main navigation

• App performance improvements

WE FIXED THE FOLLOWING BUGS:
• The welcome message reappears after it was closed
• Other minor debug

COMING SOON: New features and enhancements in the next releases. The Apple Watch app will be back with better features. Stay tuned!
 
* Unavailable in the USA and in Canada due to distribution restrictions. Available only in English for Arabic and Persian editions.

Keep up to date with Euronews. A version your Apple Watch, iPhone and iPad will love

NEW FEATURES: 
• Apple Watch: With the latest version, find the latest news directly on your wrist, by:
1. Save your favorite articles to read later
2. Read articles directly on your iPhone
• Screen shots: share the best news stories
• Widget: Improved design

WHAT WE HAVE IMPROVED
• Fixed the read later service
• Information regarding geoblocking in the US & Canada
• Optimized the design for article summaries
• Improved the application's performance
• Fixed other minor bugs 

Lost? Find the apps' new functions in the Service section > About the app > Tutorial

Thank you for all your support and useful comments ! To contact us with remarks or ideas write to: appsupport@euronews.com

Keep up to date with Euronews. A version your Apple Watch, iPhone and iPad will love.

NEW FEATURES: 
• Apple Watch: With the latest version, find the latest news directly on your wrist, by:
1. Save your favorite articles to read later
2. Read articles directly on your iPhone
• Screen shots: share the best news stories
• Widget: Improved design

WHAT WE HAVE IMPROVED
• Persian and Arabic editions: We have fixed issues with links on some stories. We apologise for the inconvenience.
• Fixed the read later service
• Information regarding geoblocking in the US & Canada
• Optimized the design for article summaries
• Improved the application's performance
• Fixed other minor bugs

Lost? Find the apps' new functions in the Service section > About the app > Tutorial

Thank you for all your support and useful comments ! To contact us with remarks or ideas write to: appsupport@euronews.com

Minor UI improvements (iPhone X) and bug fixes
